In any event, the phrase` old Europe' entered the vernacular. The segments of Americans that preferred calling french fries` freedom fries" loved it, he writes. Jim Bopp, a Terre Haute attorney who also is a Republican National Committee member, said Mike Pence could be hard to beat if he runs for governor.
